name: Tribute of Flames
description:
Every year a sacrifice is thrown into a dungeon to please a ferocious dragon and you're next on the menu. Explore a dark dungeon with twists and turns, fighting off dangerous beasts with your abilities in the form of cards, can you hunt down the dragon and slay him once and for all?

Build a deck and increase your stats as you traverse through the dungeon and face the dragon.

Created for the Dungeon Crawler Game Jam, can be completed in around 20-30 mins. Currently no saving and loading.

Controls

WASD - Move

Q, E - Turn left/right

Space bar - Interact

1, 2, 3 4, 5 - use card

T - end your turn

1, 2 -  choose menu option

textures: Jestan https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-texture-pack
